titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire to Alfred Cotton Way

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the recent hot weather; the Bunder Abbass [Bandar Abbas] affair and the murder of a Puttawalla (Persian messenger or courier).The letter also informs Way of the Bombay Government's request that Pelly visit the Persian Governor-General at Shiraz; their approval of Pelly's recommendation to blockade the port at Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] and asking Way to inform the native agent at Shargah [Sharjah] to remain there and attempt to intercept slavers vessels.
